text: Niveotectura pallida is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Lottiidae, one of the families of true limpets. ==Description== The shell can grow to be 32 mm to 60 mm. ==Distribution== Niveotectura pallida can be found off of north Japan, North Korea, and Sakhalin, Russiabasal view ==References== ==External links== * Category:Lottiidae Category:Gastropods described in 1859
title: Niveotectura pallida
